page.title: 12GLYNDLEY MANOR HOTEL
page.content: The Hankham area is near Pevensey Bay and Stone Cross.It is not a typical holiday resort area but there is a lot of beautiful countryside to enjoy. Holiday visitors from Eastbourne often visit the places of historical and inviromental interest in this area. There is only one hotel called Glyndly Manor Hotel.It is surrounded by 17 acres of land .(There was a building on the same site as the hotel in the 10'th century). The hotel caters for mainly retired or wealthy people.In the summer it attracts many people from many parts of the world.They have 2 tennis courts ,a large swimming pool and a course fishing lake and beautiful grounds in which the guest can walk and rest.They have a large restruant which serves classical french food.
